radiographic_examinations.findings: Hypoplastic right internal carotid artery, hypoplastic middle cerebral arteries, dysplastic basilar artery, and prominent intracranial cortical draining veins extending to the parafalcine region with sinus pericranii.

radiographic_examinations.date: During the patient's treatment at 5 months of age
radiographic_examinations.findings: Most of the feeders arterioles of the hemangioma had disappeared after the procedure.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Successful embolization of the facial hemangioma led to rapid involution and a progressive decrease in size within 6 weeks.
